sentence.Network_en: So, the abductive process is creative and works towards new discovery.
sentence.Network_cn: 所以, 溯因推理是创造性的过程,以新发现为目的.

sentence.Network_en: In data analysis, visualization facilitates the abductive process.
sentence.Network_cn: 在数据分析中, 可视化工具较便利于进行溯因推理.

sentence.Network_en: In summary, the Platonic scenario is dominantly inductive deductive, while the Aristotelian scenario is dominantly inductive - abductive.
sentence.Network_cn: 总结一下, 柏拉图研究用的主要方法是归纳和演译方法, 亚里士多德主要是用归纳和溯因方法.
